1.18.2.0.2.3:
- Add treated wood lumber.
 - Change treated wood planks to be crafted from treated wood lumber.
 - Add block mold.
 - Change steel block and uranium block recipe.
 - Add chisel recipe for concrete stairs and slab.
 - Fix fluid crafting recipes bugged in JEI.
 - Add Immersive Petroleum compatibility.
1.18.2.0.2.2:
- Add drill heads of black steel, blue steel and red steel. (Thank you @SnideKek for providing textures.)
 - Add missing #minecraft:mineable/pickaxe tag for quartz cluster and buds.
 - Add missing block drop for quartz block.
 - Improve field guide entries.
 - Remove malachite powder to constantan mix recipe.
1.18.2.0.2.1:
- Improve fluid crafting recipes. (JEI will now show wooden buckets and barrels can be used in place of buckets.)
 - Disallow huge items (large vessels, anvils and barrels) from entering storage crate.
1.18.2.0.2.0:
- Add compatibility for external heater to heat crucible.
 - Add barrel recipe for redstone acid.
 - Make all IE fluids usable in barrel.
 - Add bituminous coal and lignite to coal coke recipe.
 - Make coal coke a TFC fuel item.
 - Make herbicide work with TFC blocks.
 - Improve how slag is obtained (no more slag popping up when forging high carbon steel).
 - Add sheet mold -> Metal press can now make both plates and sheets using respective molds.
 - Add recipe for using IE wirecutter to cut 1 TFC sheet into 2 IE plates.
 - Remove plate tags from metal sheets.
 - Add Firmalife compatibility.
 - Add more manual entries.
 - Add manual entries to the field guide.
 - Many recipe fixes.
1.18.2.0.1.2:
- Added new chapter in the Manual about Multiblocks.
 - Added slag into other Arc Furnace Recipes.
 - Added IE Fertilizer and Slag as Fertilizers for TFC Farming system.
1.18.2.0.1.1:
- Fixed Arc Furnace Recipe for Weak Red Steel.
 - Decreased chance of generating Quartz Geode from 100 to 350.
 - Fixed Engineer's Hammer Head Name.
1.18.2.0.1-1.18.2: Addon almost done, just need to fix bugs.
